about.title:
Full-stack web developer
from Saint-Petersburg
about.description:
Hi, I’m Platon Lapp, a full-stack web developer from Saint-Petersburg. Attention to detail, professional and versatile code — it’s all about me. Feel free to contact me.
If you want to see my past and current work, just check out the contacts.
about.university: The Bonch-Bruevich Saint Petersburg State University of Telecommunications

wp.description: Web Paint is a minimalistic graphics editor on the web.

ts.description: Typing School is minimalistic keyboard trainer to practice touch typing skill.

VK.description: VK Hackathon «Vezdekod»: Prize-winning place in the 2-week hackathon of the social network Vkontakte.

MIET.description: Hackathon «MIET University»: 1st place in the 48-hour hackathon of MIET University in the case of HERE technologies
